mapper.select: SELECT ts.schedule_id, tp.trip_id, tp.username, tp.start_ymd, ts.activity_order, ts.activity_name, ts.activity_type, ts.activity_address, ts.activity_image_url FROM trip_plan tp INNER JOIN trip_schedule ts on tp.trip_id = ts.trip_id WHERE tp.username = #{username} AND ts.start_ymd IS NOT NULL AND ts.start_ymd != '' ORDER BY ts.activity_order DESC LIMIT 1;
